sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; // Import the CSS file function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ gender: "", age: "", hypertension: "", heart_disease: "", ever_married: "", work_type: "", Residence_type: "", avg_glucose_level: "", bmi: "", smoking_status: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the form from submitting and reloading the page // Gather form data const formData = { age, gender, hypertension, heartDisease, maritalStatus, workType, residenceType, avgGlucoseLevel, bmi, smokingStatus }; // Display the form data on the page const resultDiv = document.getElementById('result'); resultDiv.innerHTML = `

Form Data Submitted:

  • Age: ${formData.age}
  • Gender: ${formData.gender}
  • Hypertension: ${formData.hypertension}
  • Heart Disease: ${formData.heartDisease}
  • Marital Status: ${formData.maritalStatus}
  • Work Type: ${formData.workType}
  • Residence Type: ${formData.residenceType}
  • Average Glucose Level: ${formData.avgGlucoseLevel}
  • BMI: ${formData.bmi}
  • Smoking Status: ${formData.smokingStatus}
`; }; return (

Stroke Prediction

{/* Gender */}
{/* Age */}
{/* Hypertension */}
{/* Heart Disease */}
{/* Ever Married */}
{/* Work Type */}
{/* Residence Type */}
{/* Avg Glucose Level */}
{/* BMI */}
{/* Smoking Status */}
); } export default App;
